author: Cristina Marcos
title: Capitol marks two years since closing to public from COVID-19 | TheHill
description: Saturday marks two full years since the Capitol has been closed to the public due to the COVID-19...
content:
Saturday marks two full years since the Capitol has been closed to the public due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
